All Classes and Interfaces

类
说明
App
The JavaFX application
Ball
The ball class for all types of balls.
Ball.BallType
The type of ball
BallBuilder
The builder interface that specify the methods needed to build a ball
BallBuilderDirector
 
BallConfig
A config class that will contain the ball configuration
BallPocketStrategy
An interface for the action carried out when a ball falls into a pocket
BallsConfig
A config class that will contain all the ball configuration
BallsConfigFactory
A config factory that will handle the `ball` section of the config
BallSnapshot
 
BlackBallBuilder
 
BlueBallBuilder
Builder for blue ball
BrownBallBuilder
 
ConfigChecker
Helper class for configuration check
ConfigFactory
The config factory interface for all the config factories
ConfigFactoryRegistry
The config factory registry
Configurable
An interface for all the config class
CounterSnapshot
 
Drawable
An interface for all the drawable object
Game
Game 对象
+ 每个Game对象由config初始化
+ 持有table、counterManager等GameObject
+ 游戏的回合由counterManager控制
+ 计时、分数等由gameTimer、gameScore控制
GameConfig
A config class for the game configuration
GameConfigReader
The instance that reads the config
GameCounterManager
 
GameObjectSnapshot
 
GameReset
Resets game when the method of this instance is called
GameScore
 
GameSnapshot
 
GameTimer
 
GreenBallBuilder
 
IGenGameSnapshot
 
Movable
An interface for all the object that can move
OrangeBallBuilder
 
Pocket
The pocket of a pool table
PocketConfig
 
PocketOnce
Hide the ball once it falls into the pocket
PocketsConfig
 
PocketThird
 
PocketTwice
Hide the ball once it falls into the pocket twice or spawn it back to its original location.
PoolCue
 
PoolCue.CueStatus
 
PoolTable
A pool table
PositionConfig
A config class for the position configuration
PurpleBallBuilder
 
RedBallBuilder
Builder for red ball
ScoreSnapshot
 
SizeConfig
A config class for the size configuration
